title: Rabbi Reb Mendel Hertz Passes
body: Gerrer Chassidus mourns Rabbi Reb Yechiel Menachem Mendel Hertz z”l, a 99-year-old chassid who passed away in Yerushalayim. He was born in Poland to his father.

title: Rav of Kosel Blocks MK's Plan
body: Knesset member Yitzchok Kroizer from Otzma Yehudit plans to advance legislation redefining the role of Rabbi Shmuel after being asked not to ascend Har Habayis by the Kosel's rabbi.
